about_the_game:
OranguTangle; a casually-intense online-multiplayer game where Orangutans all compete for the title of One Of The Jungle by fighting for victory in various game modes! Return to your primal instincts as a human and compete against your friends for victory by any means necessary; batting away others, swinging with your grapple-arm and becoming what no other can... the One Of The Jungle!

Features of this game include, but are not limited to:

  • A Grapple Arm! - Swing anywhere with a responsive-feeling, fast grapple arm!

  • Seamless Multiplayer! - Run, jump, and swing with friends all over the world with a seamlessly integrated multiplayer experience!

  • Multiple Different Gamemodes - Including gamemodes such as Speedrunning, Knockout, and Tag, OranguTangle is a game for many different types of gamers!

name: OranguTangle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are currently estimated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7 10700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Give your grapple-arm a stretch, gather some friends, and swing towards victory!
